actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition, Oversight, and Department Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, Financial Services, Transportation and Infrastructure, and Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
